name: AI Dungeon
description: AI Dungeon is an AI-powered interactive storytelling platform that allows users to create and experience infinite text-based adventures and role-playing games.
longDescription: AI Dungeon is a groundbreaking AI-driven text adventure game that enables users to craft personalized stories through interactive prompts and AI-generated responses. Founded on the mission to democratize storytelling by leveraging advanced AI, it transforms traditional gaming into dynamic, limitless narratives where every choice matters. The platform serves gamers, writers, and creative enthusiasts by solving the limitations of scripted games, offering endless possibilities for exploration, role-playing, and creativity. Users can start adventures in various settings, with the AI adapting in real-time to their inputs for immersive experiences. It also incorporates features like image generation and memory systems to enhance story coherence and visual appeal. Overall, AI Dungeon empowers users to co-create with AI, fostering imagination in an accessible digital format.
features: The Memory System automatically stores and retrieves key story information to maintain coherence and improve AI responses during gameplay.
Multiple membership tiers, including a free Wanderer plan, provide access to varying AI models, context lengths, and credits for enhanced storytelling.
Image generation allows users to create visual elements for their adventures using AI, adding a multimedia dimension to text-based stories.
Advanced AI Settings enable customization of response generation, such as temperature and token limits, for tailored narrative control.
Worlds feature lets creators build structured settings with predefined elements that the AI uses to generate complex, consistent environments.
Different input modes like Do, Say, and Story allow users to interact via actions, dialogue, or narrative descriptions for flexible gameplay.
See mode integrates image creation directly into adventures, enabling visual enhancements during play.
Unlimited free access to basic AI models supports extended storytelling without mandatory payments.
Regular updates introduce new AI models, memory improvements, and content for evolving user experiences.
Beta environment offers early access to features like new models and apps for testing and feedback.
Ad-free play ensures uninterrupted immersion in stories for all users.
Context expansion up to 8x in premium plans allows for more detailed and longer story retention.
Original content and scenarios provide starting points for adventures, inspiring user creativity.

faqs.question: How do I play AI Dungeon?
faqs.answer: Start by choosing a setting, character, and name, then input actions or text in turns, and the AI will generate responses to continue the story.

faqs.question: What is the Do mode and how do I use it?
faqs.answer: Do mode lets you describe actions your character takes; enter commands like 'attack the dragon' to advance the adventure interactively.

faqs.question: What is the Say mode and how do I use it?
faqs.answer: Say mode is for dialogue; input what your character says, and the AI responds accordingly to build conversations within the story.

faqs.question: What is the Story mode and how do I use it?
faqs.answer: Story mode allows narrative inputs to describe events or scenes; use it to set broader story elements that the AI expands upon.

faqs.question: Can I play AI Dungeon for free?
faqs.answer: Yes, AI Dungeon offers a free Wanderer plan with access to basic features, unlimited storytelling, and generous context for dynamic experiences.

faqs.question: What is the Memory System?
faqs.answer: The Memory System automatically tracks and recalls important story details to keep the AI consistent and on track throughout your adventure.

faqs.question: What are Worlds in AI Dungeon?
faqs.answer: Worlds are creator-built structured experiences where the AI uses predefined information to generate complex, immersive settings for adventures.

faqs.question: What are Advanced AI Settings?
faqs.answer: Advanced Settings let you customize AI response generation, such as adjusting creativity levels or context, for a personalized gameplay experience.

faqs.question: Does AI Dungeon have image generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, through See mode and premium features, users can generate images to visualize elements of their stories during gameplay.

faqs.question: What membership plans are available?
faqs.answer: Plans include free Wanderer, Adventurer ($9.99/mo), Champion ($14.99/mo), and Legend ($29.99/mo), each offering upgraded AI models and features.

faqs.question: Is AI Dungeon ad-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, the platform provides ad-free play to ensure an uninterrupted storytelling experience for all users.
